channel.title: Dave
channel.description: On the net since mid-70s. Started two Silicon Valley companies. Wrote for Wired. Fellow at Harvard, NYU. Founder of podcasting, blogging, RSS. Open web.

item.description: It's crazy is that wearing a mask is considered a political issue. We don't allow people to crap in the middle of a supermarket. Why should we permit them to spew a deadly virus in our faces.

source:outline.text: It's crazy is that wearing a mask is considered a political issue. We don't allow people to crap in the middle of a supermarket. Why should we permit them to spew a deadly virus in our faces.

item.title: Scripting News: Our opportunity
item.description: In my humble opinion, it's no coincidence that #BLM has huge momentum now when we have the most racist president in generations. Just as it's no coincidence that the most racist president followed the first African-American president.

source:outline.text: Scripting News: Our opportunity

item.title: Closing time for some California bars as U.S. posts record coronavirus cases - Reuters

item.description: “APIs for web services, in the sense that we know them today, weren’t a thing until a few years after Fielding published his dissertation..” Not true — XML-RPC predates it. First deployed in 1998.
